items.title: The Association of Commonwealth Universities - Grant Management System (ACU-GMS)
items.description:
Developed app, site and portal with backend process model as well as database for The Association of Commonwealth Universities using Appian Technology from scratch.

About ACU:
The ACU has over 400 member universities in more than 40 countries across the Commonwealth. 70% of our members are in low and middle income countries, and we are represented in more than 50% of Commonwealth large ocean states.

ACU network covers over 10 million students and more than 1 million academic and professional staff.

payform.parseCardType() -> is used to change the types of card in mastercard, amex and visa.

items.title: IOT BASED INTELLIGENT GAS LEAKPOINT DETECTING AND LOCATING SYSTEM
items.description:
Presented this project in National Level Project Exhibition held at Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.


Abstract :

We need to enhance the safety measure by our system to notify the person like gas leakage detection and notification system and Automatic Restroom cleaning notification system. Gas leakages results a difficult issue in family unit and different regions, in this way the proposed gas spillage discovered. With the sensor is utilized to identify gas spillage at home. On the off chance that the gas spillage is detected naturally it will send SMS to the client. WIFI and GSM module is one of the most utilized systems over the world. Consequently, load cell has been utilized to screen the heaviness of the LPG gas normally. On the off chance that the gas in the chamber shows a worth where the rest of the rate level is crossed underneath the limit level(threshold) set for gas to be shown as getting discharged. Thus, answer warning will be sent to the client about the leakage. Simultaneously, application programming is created to find the gas leakage in the specific area. By our system it is also possible to clean the public restroom. If it is awful smell is exhaust, then the notification is send to their contractor and its cleaning agent.


Using 
-> Arduino Uno
-> ESP8266 ( Wi-Fi module)
-> GSM Module
-> MQ2 sensor or MQ5 sensor
-> ESP-01 adaptor
-> IOT
-> Watson IoT platform
-> Push Bullet Notification
-> Node Red
-> Arduino IDE
